Description: Masterpieces rendered in both paint and stone surround you. A breath taking `bust` of the Morpheus from the matrix figures prominently in the center of the room. On a raised dias in the back is `portrait` of the current king and queen. Some other works catch your eye, but none so much as a mirror. Clearly some art school grad student was going for a, find the art within yourself vibe. The exits lead to the `kitchen`, `ballroom`, `banquethall`, `mainfloorfoyer`, and `library`.
